Posts.Content: Such a good news! Can you share a link about this study if you know any? I would like to read more about it. Thanks for sharing by the way.
Posts.Title: Pioneering radiotherapy treatment for Breast Cancer

Posts.Content: Hello there, where did you read about push up bras being unhealthy to the breasts? I would like to know more, can you share a link or something?
Posts.Title: Breaking the Ice and Speaking of Breast Cancer

Posts.Content: My grandmother left feet toes turned black, like literally black, her toes were dying or dead, and the doctor had to amputated them, they were causing her an extreme pain, the only difference is my grandmother didn’t had cancer, the doctor told us it was due to her old rheumatism that she didn’t get good treatment for.
Posts.Title: feet turning black ?

Posts.Content: Hello Kat Lover, I’m sorry you’re going through this, just know that you’re not alone in this, I know it’s hard to deal with the pain and all the changes that you face in your life because of this disease, and there isn’t much you can do about it, my aunt had breast cancer too, she’s also living with one boob, I wish you the very best during your treatment and recovery. Emily
Posts.Title: Reconstruction question
